org.eel.kitchen.jsonschema.util.jackson

Class CustomJsonNodeFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.JsonNodeFactory
      • org.eel.kitchen.jsonschema.util.jackson.CustomJsonNodeFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public final class CustomJsonNodeFactory
extends JsonNodeFactory
    Custom JsonNodeFactory and ObjectMapper

    Jackson's default node factory and mapper fall short of conformant JSON Schema processing on two points:

    • for floating point instances, double is used by default; however, neither the JsonNodeFactory and ObjectMapper:

      • it uses DeserializationFeature.USE_BIG_DECIMAL_FOR_FLOATS when creating the mapper; this allows to not lose any scale or precision on arbitrarily large floating point instances;
      • it overrides JsonNodeFactory.numberNode(BigDecimal) to strip any final zeroes and generates a (precision-dependent) integer node if the resulting decimal part is empty.

      This class also uses custom implementations for ObjectNode and ArrayNode.

    See Also:
    BigDecimal.stripTrailingZeros(), BigDecimal.scale(), Serialized Form
